text: Bekić is a Serbo-Croatian surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Almir Bekić (born 1989), Bosnian footballer * Andrea Bekić (born 1965), Croatian diplomat * Darko Bekić (born 1946), Croatian historian and diplomat * Dejan Bekić (1944–1967), former Serbian footballer Category:Bosnian-language surnames Category:Croatian-language surnames Category:Serbian-language surnames Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Bekić
